tasks.label: Build to packaged executable with PyInstaller
tasks.command: cd ${workspaceFolder}; rm -r dist; rm -r build; python -m venv ./build/emoInstallEnv; ./build/emoInstallEnv/Scripts/activate; pip install --upgrade build; python -m build; pip install --find-links=dist exifMapOverlay[installer]; python -m PyInstaller ./build/emoInstallEnv/Lib/site-packages/exifMapOverlay/__main__.py -n exifMapOverlay --onedir --hide-console hide-early --icon ./build/emoInstallEnv/Lib/site-packages/exifMapOverlay/resources/logo_emo.ico --distpath ./dist --exclude-module numpy; cp ./build/emoInstallEnv/Lib/site-packages/exifMapOverlay/resources/ ./dist/exifMapOverlay/_internal/exifMapOverlay/resources -r; rm exifMapOverlay.spec
